name: astrophysics
displayName: Astronomy and Astrophysics Metadata

name: name
displayName: description

name: astroType
displayName: The nature or genre of the content of the files in the dataset.

name: astroFacility
displayName: The observatory or facility where the data was obtained.

name: astroInstrument
displayName: The instrument used to collect the data.

name: astroObject
displayName: Astronomical Objects represented in the data (Given as SIMBAD recognizable names preferred).

name: resolution.Spatial
displayName: The spatial (angular) resolution that is typical of the observations, in decimal degrees.

name: resolution.Spectral
displayName: The spectral resolution that is typical of the observations, given as the ratio \u03bb/\u0394\u03bb.

name: resolution.Temporal
displayName: The temporal resolution that is typical of the observations, given in seconds.

name: coverage.Spectral.Bandpass
displayName: Conventional bandpass name

name: coverage.Spectral.CentralWavelength
displayName: The central wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters.

name: coverage.Spectral.Wavelength
displayName: The minimum and maximum wavelength of the spectral bandpass.

name: coverage.Spectral.MinimumWavelength
displayName: The minimum wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters.

name: coverage.Spectral.MaximumWavelength
displayName: The maximum wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters.

name: coverage.Temporal
displayName: Time period covered by the data.

name: coverage.Temporal.StartTime
displayName: Dataset Start Date

name: coverage.Temporal.StopTime
displayName: Dataset End Date

name: coverage.Spatial
displayName: The sky coverage of the data object.

name: coverage.Depth
displayName: The (typical) depth coverage, or sensitivity, of the data object in Jy.

name: coverage.ObjectDensity
displayName: The (typical) density of objects, catalog entries, telescope pointings, etc., on the sky, in number per square degree.

name: coverage.ObjectCount
displayName: The total number of objects, catalog entries, etc., in the data object.

name: coverage.SkyFraction
displayName: The fraction of the sky represented in the observations, ranging from 0 to 1.

name: coverage.Polarization
displayName: The polarization coverage

name: redshiftType
displayName: RedshiftType string C "Redshift"; or "Optical" or "Radio" definitions of Doppler velocity used in the data object.

name: resolution.Redshift
displayName: The resolution in redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object.

name: coverage.RedshiftValue
displayName: The value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s in the data object.

name: coverage.Redshift.MinimumValue
displayName: The minimum value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s in the data object.

name: coverage.Redshift.MaximumValue
displayName: The maximum value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s in the data object.

name: DatasetField
displayName: identifier
